scope.title: Intro to Next.js
scope.author: Shashank Rawat
scope.summary: Next.js is an open-source React front-end development web framework created by Vercel that enables functionality such as server-side rendering and generating static websites for React based web applications.

frontMatter.title: Intro to Next.js
frontMatter.author: Shashank Rawat
frontMatter.summary: Next.js is an open-source React front-end development web framework created by Vercel that enables functionality such as server-side rendering and generating static websites for React based web applications.

prev.title: Leetcode 217 - Contains Duplicate
prev.author: Shashank Rawat
prev.summary: Given an integer array nums, return true if any value appears at least twice in the array, and return false if every element is distinct.

next.title: Next.js :  Adding Storybook
next.author: Shashank Rawat
next.summary: Storybook is a tool for UI development. It makes development faster and easier by isolating components. This allows you to work on one component at a time. You can develop entire UIs without needing to start up a complex dev stack, force certain data into your database, or navigate around your application.
